Summary: Biochemical reaction from imatinib to imatinib (pyridine)-n-oxide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or FMO3.
Biochemical reaction from imatinib to hydroxyimatinib metabolites. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A1 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from imatinib to AFN911. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A1, CYP3A4, CYP1B1 or CYP4F3.
Biochemical reaction from imatinib to imatinib (piperidine)-n-oxide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or FMO3.
Biochemical reaction from imatinib to desmethylimatinib. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP4F2, CYP1A1, CYP3A4, CYP2C8 or CYP3A5.
Transport from imatinib to imatinib. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC22A1.
Transport from imatinib to imatinib. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB1 or ABCG2.
Transport from imatinib to imatinib. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC22A1.
Transport from imatinib to imatinib. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC22A1.
Transport from imatinib to imatinib. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCG2 or ABCB1.
